rows.label: tev030801_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Sostenasa about his work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sostenasa if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Sostenasa about Skell insurance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Sostenasa for Skell combat tips.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Our ship handles most of the work when it comes to
clothing, feeding, and housing the Ma-non, understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0002
rows.name:
That means most of of of our work comes down to
keeping those machines maintained.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0003
rows.name:
We don't concern ourselves with the menial jobs you
humans seem so fond of, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0008
rows.name:
What can I say? Another day where you guys break
everything you touch and and then dump it in our laps.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0009
rows.name:
But I guess that means you're out there on the
battlefield fighting for your lives, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0010
rows.name:
We made a promise, didn't we? You smash your gear
up, and we fix it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0011
rows.name:
It's hard work, but I think Fozimure and I are ready to
bear down and get it done...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0018
rows.name:
If we charged you guys for the salvage every time you
ruined a Skell, one nasty clash would be enough to
bankrupt you, would it not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0019
rows.name: That's why most of your Skells are insured, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0020
rows.name:
As long as that insurance doesn't run out, we're willing
to repair Skells free of charge, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0021
rows.name:
But maybe don't take that as a license for recklessness?
Because HQ has to make sacrifices elsewhere to pay
those insurance premiums.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0022
rows.name:
Try to remember that a Skell doesn't make you
invincible, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0023
rows.name:
Have you ever seen the repair fees on a wrecked Skell?
High. So so SO high![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0024
rows.name:
If your Skell's getting close to the end, don't be a
nitwit about it, okay? Get out and fight on foot,
or run away, or...something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0025
rows.name:
If more people did that, we might actually be able to
take a day off once in a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Sostenasa about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0012
rows.name:
You don't seem like the other nimrods. You know,
the ones who keep running their Skells into the ground?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0013
rows.name:
But that doesn't mean I'm A-okay with humans,
understand? Not even close.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0014
rows.name:
You guys run around this city like everything is
expendable and replaceable, don't you?
You don't have enough love for what you have...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0015
rows.name:
To the average Ma-non who's been tinkering with
machines since nearly the day he was born,
you come across as rather...shallow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0016
rows.name:
But that softy Fozimure keeps kowtowing to your
ridiculous repair demands, doesn't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev030801_MSG0017
rows.name:
So maybe you should tell your BLADE friends to have a
little more respect for their property and the folks who
keep it working?[ST:wait ]
